oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Richard Montgomery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full-length portrait of Richard Montgomery (1738-1775) in military uniform, standing, pointing to a map on the wall.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Generals; Uniforms; Maps
Montgomery, Richard, 1738-1775; United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--Portraits
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: G.R. Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: American Revolutionary general; killed during the assault on Quebec.
